mapper.sql: id AS id, hospital_name AS hospitalName, hospital_alias AS hospitalAlias, hospital_inform AS hospitalInform, hospital_grade AS hospitalGrade, hospital_weight AS hospitalWeight, type_id AS typeId, city_id AS cityId, activation_flag AS activationFlag, order_weight AS orderWeight, create_user AS createUser, create_time AS createTime, update_user AS updateUser, update_time AS updateTime, delete_user AS deleteUser, delete_time AS deleteTime, del_flag AS delFlag
mapper.select: select from base_hospital where id = #{value} and del_flag = '0'
select from base_hospital where hospital_name = #{value} and del_flag = '0'
